title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel is not working

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Is there a way to fix this or no? Do I have to reinstall the game? Pls help ;-;

replies.body: The patcher needs permissions to launch and scan files, otherwise you may end up with an error message like this.  I suggest going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access and get you in-game.  That should fix this right up!
Running it as Administrator worked. Thank you so much! :D
